Articles.Content:
for being so awesome!

I think that many of us have fallen victim to the amazing possibilities that C7 has brought us, we have neglected our space exploration. I personally haven\'t been to the mun in quite some time. I have been heading down the block and back to practice landings, (got a rather nice little VTOL in the works). Anyway, I have been thinking, I need to start some work on ships. Let me clarify; planes are great, and rockets are as Kerbal as it gets, but, what about some space ships, the kind designed to more or less hang out in space all the time? Granted, just watching orbits for hours at a time got old a week after the mun suddenly popped into existence, but the ship ideas abound. Pics if i come up with anything worthwhile.

My C7-built Kestrel spaceplane is capable of Mun landings.

But yeah. I asked for Hunter-Gratzner parts, but no one responded.

I made a simple delta-wing that was capable of landing on the mun, and in fact was great fun to fly as well, but slapping RCS ports on a plane just make a plane that can maneuver in space. The Kestrel is a bit closer to what I am talking about.

I saw the post where you requested the Hunter-Gratzner parts, but I can\'t model to save my life. I am attempting to learn, and I hear that it is pretty easy for this game, but I am not there yet.
Oh, no you don\'t...no more awesome out of you. Sit back down. (kidding, yes please)
*cough* Aries Ib, Odyssey One, Alexei Leonov *hack*

*cough* Aries Ib, Odyssey One, Alexei Leonov *hack*

*Ruff* 42 *Squack*
